pkgmetadata.longdescription: Amazon Web Services Bundle Package // A bundle of all of 'cloudyr' project http://cloudyr.github.io/ packages for Amazon Web Services ('AWS') https://aws.amazon.com/. It depends upon all of the 'cloudyr' project's 'AWS' packages. It is mainly useful for installing the entire suite of packages; more likely than not you will only want to load individual packages one at a time.
